footer.text-info: Arthibition is the online exhibition and market of visual arts based on original Iranian art which has successfully gained trust of many unique Iranian artists by presenting a combination of ease of access, beautiful design, international presentation and bilingual website while a vast presence in various social media. Arthibition was created in winter 2015, Tehran/ Iran, to connect talented artists, collectors and galleries to art lovers and buyers who value art immensely.

welcome_step.title: Welcome to arthibition's online consulting!
welcome_step.description: Arthibition presents online services regarding whatever you need to make a good and proper choice while buying an artwork and in case you need in-person consultation and wish to visit the artwork, we would always welcome you at arthibition. we recommend you to fill in the following sections accurately so you could receive better offers:

adv_question.pecific_category_question: Do you consider buying from a specific category?
adv_question.investment_question: Do you buy artworks for investment proposes?
adv_question.type_investment_question: What type of investment do you prefer?
adv_question.specific_artist_question: Do you consider any specific artist or artists?

select_favorite_artwork_step.title: Select your favorite artworks
select_favorite_artwork_step.description: Please visit the site through the following link and select couple of works similar to your taste, so we could consider them for consultation:

extra_description_step.title: More details
extra_description_step.description: In case you have complementary explanations regarding your expectation of consultation and artworks selection, please let us know:

advistory-submited.title: Your request has been registered successfully
advistory-submited.description: we will contact and present you with our guidelines and suggestion after preliminary review. you could also contact us through following links, in case you wish to:
advistory-submited.arthibition_address_1: Tehran, Shariati Ave., Kousha St., Naseri St., Ghandi (Daria) St., No. 6.

empty.title: Your cart is empty!
empty.description: No item has been added to your cart. to buy artworks from Arthibition click on ''buy artwork''

work-with-us.terms_cooperation_description: We want to take a valuable and great step for the excellence of art in our country, which requires knowledge and artistic taste. Therefore, we intend to bring together a capable and powerful group by creating an intimate and professional environment to serve artists, art lovers and the visual arts community: If you are interested in joining us, you can send us your resume and information.
work-with-us.interviewing_artists: Interviewing artists and making music videos
